results.title: Reversing multi-drug resistance by polymeric metformin to enhance antitumor efficacy of chemotherapy.
results.text_hl: Reversing @<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Multidrug_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018088 @@@multi-drug resistance@@@ by polymeric @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to enhance antitumor efficacy of chemotherapy.

results.title: Transport of metformin metabolites by guanidinium exporters of the small multidrug resistance family
results.text_hl: Transport of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ metabolites by @CHEMICAL_Guanidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019791 @@@guanidinium@@@ exporters of the small @<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Multidrug_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018088 @@@multidrug resistance@@@ family

results.title: Counteracting Chemoresistance with Metformin in Breast Cancers: Targeting Cancer Stem Cells
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ selectively targets CSCs and improves the @DISEASE_Hypoxia_Brain @DISEASE_MESH:D002534 @@@hypoxic@@@ microenvironment, suppresses the @DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@tumor metastasis@@@ and @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, as well as regulates the metabolic programming, induces apoptosis, and reverses epithelial-mesenchymal transition and @<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Multidrug_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018088 @@@MDR@@@.

citations.NLM: Samuel SM, Varghese E, Koklesová L, Líšková A, Kubatka P, Büsselberg D. Counteracting Chemoresistance with Metformin in Breast Cancers: Targeting Cancer Stem Cells Cancers (Basel). 2020 Sep 1;12(9):. PMID: 32883003

results.title: Metformin increases gut multidrug resistance genes in type 2 diabetes, potentially linked to Escherichia coli.
results.text_hl: The contig-based analysis led to the same conclusion: an increase in @<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Multidrug_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018088 @@@MDR-ARGs@@@ due to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was associated with an increase in @SPECIES_562 @@@E. coli@@@.

results.title: Metformin Derivative HL156A Reverses Multidrug Resistance by Inhibiting HOXC6/ERK1/2 Signaling in Multidrug-Resistant Human Cancer Cells
results.text_hl: Our results showed that @CHEMICAL_HL156A @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000609148 @@@HL156A@@@ inhibited @<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Multidrug_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018088 @@@MDR@@@ cell proliferation more potently than @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Jeong YS, Lam TG, Jeong S, Ahn SG. Metformin Derivative HL156A Reverses Multidrug Resistance by Inhibiting HOXC6/ERK1/2 Signaling in Multidrug-Resistant Human Cancer Cells Pharmaceuticals (Basel). 2020 Aug 28;13(9):. PMID: 32872293

results.title: Reversal of multidrug resistance of hepatocellular carcinoma cells by metformin through inhibiting NF-kappaB gene transcription.
results.text_hl: Reversal of @<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Multidrug_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018088 @@@multidrug resistance@@@ of @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@hepatocellular carcinoma@@@ cells by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ through inhibiting @GENE_NFKB1 @GENE_4790 @@@NF-kappaB@@@ gene transcription.

results.title: Targeting P-glycoprotein function, p53 and energy metabolism: Combination of metformin and 2-deoxyglucose reverses the multidrug resistance of MCF-7/Dox cells to doxorubicin
results.text_hl: The mutually reinforcing effect made the combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2DG@@@ had a better effect on reversing @<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Multidrug_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018088 @@@MDR@@@.

results.title: Metformin enhances doxorubicin sensitivity via inhibition of doxorubicin efflux in P-gp-overexpressing MCF-7 cells.
results.text_hl: These results indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could reverse @<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Multidrug_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018088 @@@MDR@@@ in @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@ cells by reducing @GENE_PGP @GENE_283871 @@@P-gp@@@ activity.

results.title: Targeting P-glycoprotein expression and cancer cell energy metabolism: combination of metformin and 2-deoxyglucose reverses the multidrug resistance of K562/Dox cells to doxorubicin.
results.text_hl: Here, we investigated whether combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2-deoxyglucose@@@ reverses the @<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Multidrug_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018088 @@@multidrug resistance@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Multidrug_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018088 @@@MDR@@@) of @CELLLINE_CVCL:0004 @@@K562/Dox@@@ cells and tried to elucidate the possible mechanisms.

results.title: Metformin reverses multidrug resistance in human hepatocellular carcinoma Bel-7402/5-fluorouracil cells
results.text_hl: These results indicated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may reverse the @<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Multidrug_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018088 @@@MDR@@@ of @CELLLINE_CVCL:5492 @@@Bel/Fu@@@ cells.
